author: Reuters Editorial
title: Michigan State University president resigns over gymnasts abuse case
text:
(Reuters) - The president of Michigan State University said on Wednesday she is tendering her resignation after facing a barrage of criticism for not doing enough to halt the abuse by a doctor who worked at the school and was convicted of molesting U.S. gymnasts.
“As tragedies are politicized, blame is inevitable. As president, it is only natural that I am the focus of this anger,” Lou Anna Simon said in a resignation letter.
Reporting by Jon Herskovitz; Editing by Sandra Maler
